#summary How to configure Multiwii to work with LEDring

= Supported releases =

== Pre MultiWii 2.0 ==
Not supported

== MultiWii 2.0 and 2.1 ==

=== option 1 - standard MultiWii ledring functionality ===
find and enable //#define LED_RING in config.h

=== option 2 - enhanced MultiWii ledring functionality === 
replace led.ino with alternative led.ino from downloads
find and enable //#define LED_RING in config.h
